com.intland.codebeamer.remoting.client

Class BatchRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.remoting.client.BatchRecorder

  • public class BatchRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for capturing method calls on RemoteApi for batching with RemoteApi.batch(BatchMethodCall[]) method.

    Usage: 

            BatchRecorder recorder = new BatchRecorder();

        recorder.callInBatch(new BatchRecorder.ICall() {
          public void record(RemoteApi api) {
                  api.findTrackerItemCommentsByTrackerItemId(token, ti.getId());
          }

          public void processResult(BatchMethodResult result) throws Throwable {
              try {
                commentMap.put(ti, result.getResult(false));
              } catch (Throwable t) {
                 // skip
              }
          }

  // call the real remote api
        RemoteApi remoteApi = ...
        recorder.executeCalls(remoteApi);
 
    
 Note: This class is NOT thread safe!
